title: (x) Epoxy Armor futuristic wide sans - Space Age {Sander}
content:
Can anyone ID the font used in this logotype? I’d also be interested in similar looking fonts. (It’s a client request.)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/epoxyarmor_3920.jpg)

 [‹ Astroboy font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044856/http:/typophile.com/node/20389 "Go to previous forum topic") [Grainger Logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044856/http:/typophile.com/node/20387 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pbjameson

comments.content:
see this page as well:  
 [http://mickeyavenue.com/fonts/spaceage/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209044856/http:/mickeyavenue.com/fonts/spaceage/ "http://mickeyavenue.com/fonts/spaceage/")

it’s based on the lettering used for the Disney Mission: Space ride in Florida.. so you may want to inform your clients of this. and it’s not a free font if you’re using it commercially either.
Sweet. Thanks for the very detailed information.
